description: Try our easy to follow Italian Sausage And Sage Fettuccine recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Italian Sausage And Sage Fettuccine Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drain pasta and reserve a 1/2 cup of liquid. Toss through the pork mince and top with crispy sage leaves and freshly shaved parmesan.
